newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombia's April oil output more than 630,000 bpd.
newsitem.headline: Colombia's April oil output more than 630,000 bpd.

text.p: Colombia produced more than 630,000 barrels of crude oil per day in April, the state oil company Ecopetrol said Friday.

It gave no comparative figure for previous months but said Ecopetrol was directly responsible for 120,000 bpd of the production, while companies working under association contracts with Ecopetrol produced an additional 500,000 bpd.
